title: Welcome to the 8th Cardiff Transplant Symposium!
text:
Get ready for a day full of inspiring talks, informative discussions, and networking opportunities with transplant professionals.



Join us on Fri Oct 06 2023 at Bute Terrace, Cardiff, CF10 2FL for an exciting day of discussions and presentations from leading experts in the field of transplantation. This in-person event will provide opportunities for networking and learning about the latest advances in transplantation research and practice. Don’t miss out on this chance to connect with like-minded individuals and expand your knowledge in this important area. See you there!

title: Makis Laftsidis
text: I am a Consultant Transplant Surgeon with main interest in Kidney/Pancreas Transplantation, Multi-organ Retrieval, Laparoscopic and Robotic Donor Nephrectomy and Complex Vascular Access Surgery

title: another speaker
text: Finley Malloc is the Chief Data Scientist at Wengo Analytics. When not innovating on data platforms, Finley enjoys spending time unicycling and playing with her pet iguana.
